item.title: Ghent University address book in Thunderbird
item.description: UGent address book support in Mozilla Thunderbird Ghent University has an LDAP address book which contains all students and staff. Adding this address book to Thunderbird is non-trivial, though. Follow these steps to add it. Install the extensions “TbSync” and “Provider for Exchange ActiveSync”. (Press alt to show the menu and choose Edit > Preferences > Add-ons and Themes) Open TBSync settings, click Account actions > Add New Account > Exchange ActiveSync.
